description:
nova-manage syslog checks for '/var/log/syslog'... which doesn't exist on my Fedora laptop.

This seems like a silly call to have... but so long as we have it... might as well work on Fedora too.
title: nova-manage syslog should work on Fedora/RHEL

comments.content:

commit 35ec9f3c251c1bed1980108a4645485fbf39a3d3
Author: Dan Prince <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Mar 12 15:55:25 2012 -0400

    Make nova-manage syslog check /var/log/messages.
    
    Updates nova-manage syslog so that it checks /var/log/messages.
    
    Fixes LP Bug #953354.
